text: 8.4 Wkp 14.1-32, Mat 9.30, Mak 5.43, 7.36, Luk 5.14, 17.14 Anɨgek, Jisas bɨ anɨb anop agak, Yɨp dɨnɨgek suŋ lup agɨl, bɨ olap ma agɨnɨmɨn agak. Bɨ Mosis bɨlel God takaw ak ñu kɨl tɨkak tek, nad anɨgɨnɨmɨn agak. Nad amɨl, bɨ God nop sɨbogep ak nop wak nad yoman agak. Yomɨl, soy ladek yad ak suŋ lup agɨl, tap olap God nop ñɨnɨmɨn agak. Ñe, bɨ okok kɨli soy ladek nad ak suŋ lup agɨl nɨgɨnɨgabal agak.
